description:
Imagine having a list of things you want from your boardshorts like "collaborates with indigenous communities on artwork", "made sustainably", and "stylish and functional enough to go between surf sessions and lunch dates". And then imagine finding that short. Crazy, right?

We think there's nothing wrong with crazy, especially when it looks like the Roots Studio Boardshort for men. So go ahead, grab a pair. If you love a deeper cause and dig a stylish short, these are for you.
name: Prana Roots Studio Boardshorts, 6" Inseam - Mens
